name: Inca Trail To Machupicchu 2 Days / 1 Night
description:
This is the most popular and frequented Trail. Trail booking at Peru´s National Cultural Institute INC is not changeable or refundable! Maximum 500 people per day hike this trail.

This is the short and easier Inka Trail, starting from km 104 and taking you to Winay Wayna. 
Visit to Machu Picchu on day 2.
